amendatorysection.para: (1) The Governor shall appoint the director of the council.
(a) Supervise, develop, and oversee the actions and proceedings of the council;
(b) Ensure, by working in consultation with the council, consistency between sentencing guidelines and the availability of community correctional facilities and programs;
(c) Administer contracts entered into by the council with community correctional facilities or programs; and
(d) Establish and administer grants, projects, and programs for the operation of the council.
